title: FOR SALE: colorfonts.com
content:
I own the domain COLORFONTS.COM which will expire on the 9th of this month.   
   
I'm not ready to do an eBay auction, so what I'd like to try is a blind auction:   
   
Email me at [hrant@inverselogic.com](mailto:hrant@inverselogic.com) with an offer in US dollars. The highest offer will be notified by reply email, and then I would request the amount sent to me in the form of a money order or a bank transfer.   
   
If there's not enough time to complete the process by the exiration day, I will renew the registration on my end with the understanding that the registration amount will be added to the price. Or I will redo the auction with a fully renewed domain, which should simply bring a higher price.   
   
This message being public, I presume it can take the place of a legally binding contract. If not, feel free to write something up for me to sign.   
   
hhp
author: hrant

comments.content:
Also:   
1. There has to be a time cutoff for making an offer. September 5, 11AM PST   
2. I would like to add a minimum bid amount: US$100
